labels.name: P2: Fix can wait a while

data.actual_result: Guild referenced in the invite is automatically joined, without consent.
data.expected_result: The invite pop-out is supposed to show with the guild information, and require confirmation to join.
data.short_description: Linking an invite in a rich embed, then clicking it joins without consent/invite modal.
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a rich embed with any property that allows markdown, which contains an invite link (raw embed: {"fields": [{"inline": true, "name": "test", "value": "[](INVITE LINK)"}], "type": "rich"}). - Click the link in the rich embed -
